idea-plugin.name: MapStructPlugin
idea-plugin.change-notes:
> How to Use The Plugin
- Select the xml code.
- press Ctrl + Shift + ` shortcut and provide the details.
- Code will be generated at the specified location.
- Can run in any platform independent of OS. - Can just view generated code without writing. - Can get code in pop up for already created class and append the missing part. - you can go to action by pressing (⌘+Shift+A or Ctrl+Shift+A) and type plugin name and change the shortcut yourself.
idea-plugin.description:
This is a productivity tool to be used when you're modernizing you're moving the mappings from Dozer to Mapstruct in your applications. With this plugin,
  1. Select your <mapper>, <mappers> mapper definitions.
  2. Press shortcut to generate equivalent Mapstruct definitions in seconds.
What this solves,
  • Straight forward mapping definitions with fields and ignore fields.
  • Mapid.
We'll be covering more cases of mapping in upcoming releases. Feel free to contribute to the source code With love from TechConative ❤️
